text: Home is Cantopop artist Miriam Yeung's () seventh EP album. It was released by Capital Artists on 7 October 2010. The album includes five new songs, two of which were featured in her movies: Love in a Puff () and Perfect Wedding ().Yeasia – Home album info. Retrieved 4 April 2011 The album also included four music videos. ==Track listing== # 呼吸需要 (Breathing Needs—Song in Love in a Puff) # 斗零踭 (High Heels) # 飲酒思源2.0 (When Drinking Wine, Remember Its Origin version 2) # 初見 (First Sight—Song in Perfect Wedding) # 我係我 (I Am Me) ==Music videos== # 呼吸需要 (Breathing Needs) MV # 斗零踭 (High Heels) MV # 飲酒思源2.0 (When Drinking Wine, Remember Its Origin version 2) MV # 初見 (First Sight) MV ==Awards and Recognitions== {| class="wikitable" !width="270"|Song !width=200|Award !width="30"|Ref |- | rowspan = "2" align="center" | 斗零踭 (High Heels) | Metro Showbiz Hit Awards – Hit Song |align="center"| 2010 Metro Showbiz Hit Awards List.
